The Clock Tower above the Houses of Parliament is truly a marvel of Victorian engineering! Who says the Victorians were stupid & thick-skinned people, far from it!
To think we have the likes of Edward John Dent who designed & built the Great Clock's mechanism & Edmund Beckett Denison who designed the Great Clock's 3 legged gravity escapement & 2 second pendulum which keeps the Clock accurate within the 2 seconds tolerance permitted!
Long may the Great Clock keep accurate ticking & the quarter chimes & Big Ben itself make themselves heard over London!
